WorkflowInfo.Name: SNOW Download
WorkflowInfo.Xoml:
<SequentialWorkflowActivity xmlns="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml/workflow" xmlns:x="http://schemas.microsoft.com/winfx/2006/xaml" x:Name="CustomWorkflow" x:Class="WorkflowDesignerControl.CustomWorkflow"> <MemorySet x:Name="url" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="SnowUrl" VariableValue="dev73961.service-now.com" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /> <MemorySet x:Name="user" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="UserName" VariableValue="admin" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /> <MemorySet x:Name="pass" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="Password" VariableValue="Welcome@123" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /> <MemorySet x:Name="table" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="TableName" VariableValue="incident" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /> <MemorySet x:Name="number" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="RecordNumber" VariableValue="INC0010090" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /> <MemorySet x:Name="path" activityLicenseType="1" id="430" name="MemorySet" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="Set Memory" Description="Allocates a value to a Workflow/Global variable" VariableScope="Workflow" IsSaved="False" VariableName="Location" VariableValue="C:\TEST\" IsAppend="False" TypeName="MemorySet" /> <PowerShellScript x:Name="powerShellScript1" activityLicenseType="1" id="87" name="PowerShellScript" visible="True" disabled="False" isFavorite="False" isJsonValid="True" IsValid="True" Timeout="00:01:00" TimeInSeconds="60" RecoveryMethodSelection="{x:Null}" TargetModuleID="" TargetModuleName="" Path="{x:Null}" DisplayName="PowerShell Script" Description="Executes a Powershell script on a local device" ScriptPath="" ScriptCode="Param($UserName,$Password,$SnowUrl,$TableName,$RecordNumber,$Location)
$RecordNumber = $RecordNumber
$admin = $UserName
$location = $Location
$Table_name = $TableName
$url = $SnowUrl
$password = $Password | ConvertTo-SecureString -AsPlainText -Force 
$Credential = New-Object pscredential -ArgumentList ($admin,$password)
[Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12
$Uri = "https://$($url)/api/now/table/$($Table_name)?sysparm_query=number=$($RecordNumber)&sysparm_fields=sys_id&sysparm_limit=1"
$IncidentResult = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $Uri -Method Get -Credential $Credential -UseBasicParsing
$result = $IncidentResult.Content
$json = $result | ConvertFrom-Json
$sys_id = $json.psobject.properties.value
$sys_id = $sys_id.sys_id

if($sys_id -ne $null) {
 [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12
 $IncidentAttachments = Invoke-WebRequest -Uri "https://$($url)/api/now/attachment?sysparm_query=table_sys_id=$($sys_id)" -Method Get -Credential $Credential -UseBasicParsing
 $json = $IncidentAttachments.Content | ConvertFrom-Json
 $jsondata = $json.psobject.properties.value
 $file_name = $jsondata.file_name
 #$file_name
 $download_link = $jsondata.download_link
 $count = $download_link.Count
 #$Results

 for($i = 0 ; $i -le $count-1 ; $i++ ){
 [Net.ServicePointManager]::SecurityProtocol = [Net.SecurityProtocolType]::Tls12
 Invoke-WebRequest -Uri $($download_link[$i]) -Method Get -Credential $Credential -UseBasicParsing -OutFile $location$($file_name[$i])
 }
 "Success"
}
else{
 "Incident Not Found!"
}
" scriptSource="1" TableAsString="<NewDataSet>
 <xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata">
 <xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:MainDataTable="SerializedData" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded">
 <xs:element name="SerializedData">
 <xs:complexType>
 <xs:sequence>
 <xs:element name="ParamName" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 <xs:element name="ParamValue" type="xs:string" minOccurs="0" />
 </xs:sequence>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:choice>
 </xs:complexType>
 </xs:element>
 </xs:schema><SerializedData>
 <ParamName>UserName</ParamName>
 <ParamValue>%UserName%</ParamValue>
 </SerializedData><SerializedData>
 <ParamName>Password</ParamName>
 <ParamValue>%Password%</ParamValue>
 </SerializedData><SerializedData>
 <ParamName>TableName</ParamName>
 <ParamValue>%TableName%</ParamValue>
 </SerializedData><SerializedData>
 <ParamName>RecordNumber</ParamName>
 <ParamValue>%RecordNumber%</ParamValue>
 </SerializedData><SerializedData>
 <ParamName>Location</ParamName>
 <ParamValue>%Location%</ParamValue>
 </SerializedData><SerializedData>
 <ParamName>SnowUrl</ParamName>
 <ParamValue>%SnowUrl%</ParamValue>
 </SerializedData></NewDataSet>" HasParams="1" HostId="-1" HostName="{x:Null}" TypeName="PowerShellScript" /> </SequentialWorkflowActivity>
WorkflowInfo.Permissions: <NewDataSet><xs:schema id="NewDataSet" xmlns="" xmlns:xs="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema" xmlns:msdata="urn:schemas-microsoft-com:xml-msdata"><xs:element name="NewDataSet" msdata:IsDataSet="true" msdata:UseCurrentLocale="true"><xs:complexType><xs:choice minOccurs="0" maxOccurs="unbounded"><xs:element name="resultSet"><xs:complexType><xs:sequence><xs:element name="Type" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Number" type="xs:int" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Read" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Write" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Run" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /><xs:element name="Owner" type="xs:boolean" minOccurs="0" /></xs:sequence></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:choice></xs:complexType></xs:element></xs:schema><resultSet><Type>1</Type><Number>2</Number><Read>true</Read><Write>true</Write><Run>true</Run><Owner>true</Owner></resultSet></NewDataSet>
